name: Rescue: Under Pressure
description:
Bring a friend and explore the bottom of the ocean together! Can you find the lost treasure? Be the brave Pilot and drive the submarine through the frightening underwater caves. Play as the crafty Engineer and man the sonar with care.

This is the prototype of a game developed within research work. Gameplay is based on the collaboration between two players who play asymmetric roles. One role (the Engineer) implies an entirely auditory challenge (blind accessible) and the other (the Pilot) implies a visual challenge. The game was designed as an inclusive game experience for players with mixed visual abilities.

Good dives!
